BackstoryDef.title: Raider Psycho
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a particular violent group of raiders. [PAWN_nameDef] was feared even among [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders for [PAWN_possessive] violent, volatile and utter psychopathic nature.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Slaver
BackstoryDef.description: While most raiders aren’t among the most subtle human beings and usually prefer to wipe out all who dare oppose them, [PAWN_nameDef] had a different approach. [PAWN_pronoun] realized that it was much more profitable to beat victims into submission and sell them to the highest bidder and [PAWN_nameDef] was scarily good at it.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Runt
BackstoryDef.description: Raider “Society” is based upon the ancient philosophy, that might makes right. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] never was among the mighty. Consequently, [PAWN_pronoun] was usually bossed around by the more physically imposing members of the gang and forced to do all the menial labour the other raiders wouldn’t do.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Gunslinger
BackstoryDef.description: Somewhat uncommon for a raider, [PAWN_nameDef] had a perfectly functional instinct for self-preservation. [PAWN_pronoun] always preferred to shoot people from a distance, instead of running towards them, screaming profanities and insults, just to get shot immediately. Some other raiders have thought of this as cowardly, but [PAWN_nameDef] methods were proven right as [PAWN_pronoun] outlived them all.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Iconoclast
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always had a burning passion for needless destruction and revelled in tearing down structures other, more constructive inhabitants of the wasteland erected through laborious effort.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Pit Fighter
BackstoryDef.description: Aside from the consumption of vast amounts of chems and booze, organizing pit fights and betting on them always were a favourite pastime activity of many raider groups. [PAWN_nameDef] loved fighting in the pits, eviscerating [PAWN_possessive] opponents. The caps [PAWN_pronoun] made on the side were only a bonus.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Highwayman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a raider group which camped close to a road often frequented by caravans. While they scored good loot every once in a while, no member was particularly fond of the other raiders. Eventually most members of [PAWN_possessive] raider gang tore each other apart after quarrelling over some especially valuable loot they pried from some trader’s corpse. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Pyromaniac
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loved burning things. It didn’t matter much to [PAWN_objective] if those things were animate or not, tough the latter screamed nicely after being hit with a Molotov cocktail. Naturally [PAWN_pronoun] wasn’t keen on putting fires out, even if they engulfed [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders. At least [PAWN_nameDef] was good at tending to burns, after being scorched many times.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Leader
BackstoryDef.description: Although raider society tended to be anarchistic to some degree, [PAWN_nameDef] was always seen as a leader by [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to preserve enough of [PAWN_possessive] sanity to orchestrate assaults and the subsequent sharing of the booty. [PAWN_nameDef] was aware that many of [PAWN_possessive] underlings couldn’t be reasoned with and often settled most disputes by smashing a few skulls together. [PAWN_possessive] style of leadership was have been brutal and unforgiving, just like the wasteland itself.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Fencer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] only recently became a raider. [PAWN_pronoun] was always a shifty person, staying afloat with all manners of shady activities especially fencing stolen goods. That was until [PAWN_nameDef] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wanted a bigger piece of the cake and joined a raider gang.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Outcast
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] once lived as a labourer in a small settlement somewhere in the wasteland. One fateful day, [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally killed another settler in a drunken brawl. Instead of outright killing [PAWN_objective], the goodhearted people of the settlement decided to banish [PAWN_nameDef]. While [PAWN_pronoun] wasn’t malignant, [PAWN_pronoun] joined up with a raider gang to survive in the harsh wasteland.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Tinkerer
BackstoryDef.description: Most raiders weren’t among the particularly educated. Technically this was the case with [PAWN_nameDef] too, but unlike [PAWN_possessive] fellow raiders [PAWN_pronoun] was gifted with a talent for tinkering. While [PAWN_pronoun] was occupied with the maintenance of the raiders’ shoddy equipment most of the time, [PAWN_pronoun] never missed an opportunity to craft new instruments of destruction.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Rustler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a raider specialised in stealing livestock from farmers. While this may sound like a lowly occupation for a raider, it was actually quite profitable since all humans needed to eat occasionally. Another perk of [PAWN_possessive] profession was that [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to properly care for many animals, as they fetched a higher price while still being alive and unharmed.

BackstoryDef.title: Hideout Builder
BackstoryDef.description: The majority of the countless raider gangs that plagued the wasteland had one or several hideouts. These hideouts served both as a home for the gang and a base of operations from where they went on raids and returned to afterwards. [PAWN_nameDef] was talented at building and fortifying these hideouts as well as at constructing traps for further protection. [PAWN_possessive] capabilities made [PAWN_objective] popular among the gang, since most raiders excel at destroying things, not building them.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Beastmaster
BackstoryDef.description: Some raiders captured or bred a variety of particularly nasty animals that dwelled in the wasteland to train and use them as beasts of war. [PAWN_nameDef] was a talented tamer and preferred the company of [PAWN_possessive] savage to other humans. While the training methods employed by [PAWN_nameDef] were brutal, [PAWN_pronoun] really cared about the well-being of the animals.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Cook
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the cook for [PAWN_possessive] raider gang. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to cook something adequate out of even the most spoiled or vile ingredients, which made [PAWN_objective] quite popular among the other raiders.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Traitor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was once part of a thriving settlement community. The prosperous settlement attracted the attention of a nearby raider gang which wanted to loot the place, as raiders usually do. [PAWN_nameDef] proposed a bargain to the raiders, [PAWN_pronoun] would leave the settlement’s gates unbarred in exchange for a share of the loot and the permission to join the gang. The raiders agreed and the settlement was sacked and torched. [PAWN_nameDef] became a part of the gang, but the other raiders never really trusted [PAWN_objective]. Afterall, [PAWN_pronoun] already betrayed [PAWN_possessive] once.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Anarchist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] used to live in a settlement under strict control of a paramilitary militia that ruled almost every aspect of the townspeople’s lives. One day [PAWN_pronoun] had enough and fled from the town and its oppressive regime to take up arms against it. [PAWN_nameDef] became a raider not out of greed or sadism, but out of sincere belief in anarchistic ideals. This idealism often put [PAWN_objective] at odds with other raiders, but through [PAWN_possessive] eloquence, [PAWN_pronoun] managed to persuade many of them to go after the oppressors, not the oppressed.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Thrall
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a wastelander captured by a raider gang. Instead of killing or selling [PAWN_objective] into slavery, they decided to put [PAWN_objective] to work in their encampment. [PAWN_nameDef] fulfilled all kinds of menial tasks for the gang, like cooking, clearing away debris and cleaning.

BackstoryDef.title: Deranged Artist
BackstoryDef.description: Many raiders were deranged to some degree, but few were as psychotic as [PAWN_nameDef]. In [PAWN_possessive] mind [PAWN_pronoun] was an artist of great talent. [PAWN_pronoun] made sculptures composed of severed heads impaled on metal spikes, pictures painted with blood and other unsavoury creations. Most other raiders of [PAWN_possessive] gang were terrified of [PAWN_objective] and rightly so, especially when [PAWN_possessive] was running low on “art supplies”.

BackstoryDef.title: Disinherited Farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived and worked on [PAWN_possessive] father’s farm. After the father died, [PAWN_possessive] siblings managed to trick [PAWN_objective] out of the inheritance. Enraged, [PAWN_pronoun] shot them all and the fled the farmstead to join a nearby raider gang.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Bartender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a bartender for [PAWN_possessive] raider gang, making good caps in the process. [PAWN_pronoun] gathered all the foodstuffs even the raiders deemed unfit for consumption and put them into [PAWN_possessive] still to make vile tasting, but exceptionally strong liquor. The raiders didn’t mind the repulsive taste much, all they cared about was the high alcohol content, which made the booze great for crafting Molotov cocktails too.

BackstoryDef.title: Raider Junkie
BackstoryDef.description: Most raiders were hooked on one chem or another, but [PAWN_nameDef] really outdid them all. [PAWN_pronoun] was consuming just about anything that could be snuffed, inhaled or injected. A habit which, unsurprisingly, did great damage to [PAWN_possessive] body. While [PAWN_pronoun] recently reduced [PAWN_possessive] chem intake, [PAWN_nameDef] had no intention of stopping altogether, since in battle, the drugs made [PAWN_objective] a force to be reckoned with. Plus, [PAWN_pronoun] was aware that a withdrawal probably would be lethal.

BackstoryDef.title: Warlord’s Kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the Gunner organisation. [PAWN_pronoun] spent a significant part of [PAWN_possessive] childhood being trained and drilled by stern officers. While this upbringing put little to no emphasis on creativity, it did prepare [PAWN_objective] for a life of near constant war.

BackstoryDef.title: Born Raider
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a raider. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up among some of the wasteland’s most despicable human beings and the fact [PAWN_pronoun] managed to live to adulthood was a testimony to [PAWN_possessive] resilience.

BackstoryDef.title: Stolen Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken by raiders as an infant. Lucky for [PAWN_objective] on of the more compassionate (by raider standards, which really was not saying much) gang members adopted [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Sold to Raiders
BackstoryDef.description: Either out of greed or dire need, [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a raider gang as a small child. Instead of reselling [PAWN_objective], the gang decided to keep [PAWN_objective] around and let [PAWN_objective] do all kinds of menial labour they did not want to do.

BackstoryDef.title: Pressganged
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken forcefully by raider gang in dire need of fresh meat. Thankfully, not in the literal sense. The band needed new recruits as a clash with a rival gang left their numbers severely reduced. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly adapted to [PAWN_possessive] new lifestyle as a scourge of the wasteland.

BackstoryDef.title: Jet Baby
BackstoryDef.description: Raiders were never known for wise decisions. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef] this too was the case with [PAWN_possessive] mother who used Jet while being pregnant. The drug severely damaged the development of the unborn child. [PAWN_nameDef] was born idiotic and slow. At least [PAWN_pronoun] was strong enough to crush any who dared mocking [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Junior Arsonist
BackstoryDef.description: Few raider children enjoyed a wholesome childhood, and [PAWN_nameDef] was no exception. Like [PAWN_possessive] parents, [PAWN_pronoun] had a “special” relationship with fire an enjoyed setting things ablaze. At least [PAWN_pronoun] learned a lot about the treatment of burns from the accidents that happened on a regular basis.

BackstoryDef.title: Upstart Gangster
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] learned from an early age, that [PAWN_pronoun] could get what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted through other means than just beating up whoever had it and taking it. Extortion, Bribery, and other, more subtle tactics were [PAWN_possessive] preferred way, which set [PAWN_possessive] apart from the more brutal raiders.

BackstoryDef.title: Runaway Kid
BackstoryDef.description: As a child [PAWN_nameDef] ran away from home, straight into the arms of a raider gang. Luckily, the gang decided the child would be more useful alive than dead and took [PAWN_objective] as sort of a mascot for the band.

BackstoryDef.title: Outcast Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]’s family was banished while [PAWN_pronoun] was still a child. With nowhere else to go, the family joined a local raider band. [PAWN_nameDef] had troubles adapting to [PAWN_possessive] newfound group.

BackstoryDef.title: Brutal Tribal
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up among one of the more warlike tribal societies. At some point, even [PAWN_possessive] couldn’t tolerate [PAWN_possessive] bloodthirsty and reckless behaviour and [PAWN_pronoun] was banished, leaving [PAWN_objective] no choice but to join a band of raiders, who were more appreciative of [PAWN_possessive] “talents”.

BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned Wastelander
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned as an infant and left in the wasteland to die. A group of raiders stumbled upon the child and decided to take the baby with them. Lucky for [PAWN_nameDef] the group was among the more civilised and they raised [PAWN_objective] as one of their own.

BackstoryDef.title: Graffiti Artist
BackstoryDef.description: One day, while rummaging around in some ruins surrounding [PAWN_possessive] gangs raider camp, [PAWN_nameDef] found some old cans of spray paint. While [PAWN_pronoun] most certainly would have called [PAWN_objective]self an artist, most [PAWN_pronoun] spray-painted were tags of the gangs logos an various profanities.

BackstoryDef.title: Camp Tender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a raider camp. [PAWN_possessive] task was to clean up after the raiders, to cook for them, and to patch them up after they were shot to pieces. In time, the other raiders grew to respect [PAWN_objective], as they realized their shoddy hideout would fall apart without [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: Wilful Newby
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] joined [PAWN_possessive] raider gang wilfully. As could be expected, [PAWN_pronoun] was not a particularly pleasant person to be around. At least [PAWN_pronoun] was a decent enough warrior.
